title: Harman Singh
text:
Hello! My name is Harman Singh and I am a graduate student in the Department of Geography at Penn State University, U.S.A. pursuing a dual-title Ph.D. in Geography and Climate Science. I earned my B.Sc. in Geography with a minor in Sustainability Leadership from Penn State University in 2021.
My research interests lie primarily in field of natural hazards and human-environmental systems. My Ph.D. research is grounded in disaster risk science, and I am interested in identifying future urban pluvial flood risks under a changing climate in India.
Flood News

title: Teaching
text:
Research plays a central role in my teaching as students improve their analytical skills and master core concepts of geography through hands-on experience.I have been a teaching assistant for courses that focus on research, geography, statistics, and sustainability.
